name: Wood-Carved Hat: Merchant
description: An exquisite and gorgeous wood-carved hat that can be used to assemble an "Aranara Carving."\nIt was modeled after the hat of a certain traveling merchant. That central blue decorative piece sure looks pricey, but is in fact a mere dyed stone. Even so, any woodcarving wearing such a hat would appear much more regal and extravagant.
